titleStmt.title: Something in answer to a book called Fiat lux being a discourse between a papist and a Protestant &c. who writes at the bottom of the title page, J.V.C. : also something in answer to the papists queries.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
